Contexts

Buttons

Easily create versatile buttons in a variety of styles.

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

    <button class="c-button">...</button>

    <a class="c-button" href="...">...</a>

    <div class="c-button">
      [icon]
      <span class="c-button__text">...</span>
    </div>
